issue.title: [Java] Null pointer closing unused JDBC Consumers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18179](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18179). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It’s legal to create a consumer that you never use, and then on close() vector will be null.
